title: Our first speakers announced
brief: ngVikings 2017 team is proud to announce the first part of our speaker lineup

title: We start the ticket sales!
brief: The prices start from 500DKK for the Student ticket (excl. MVA)

title: Get to the next level: 5 full-day Angular workshops for the very good price!
brief: Internationally renowned trainers, influencers, the persons you know by their presentations for the best developer conferences, by their blog posts and Angular community activities, will teach you Angular basics, best practices, advanced techniques and surrounding technologies

title: The program is published!
brief: We are excited to present 100% of our speakers and sessions: 21 technical, in-depth sessions about Angular and satellite technologies with the main focus on practical usage.

title: Angular. It's Just Angular.
brief: Let the last day of 2016 be the last day of annoying explicit "2" version mentioning in talks and workshop titles. Starting from NOW: we say "Angular" - we mean Angular "2" or later. Everywhere on this website.

title: Office Hours
brief: Unique possibility to ask the questions and get consulted by our speakers in a quiet and friendly environment.

title: Scholarship Programme
brief: ngVikings is an event organized by and for the community, and itâ€™s important to us that all members of the community should be included, also those who would normally be unable to attend for financial reasons.

title: Get Ready for ngVikings 2017!
brief: Please follow our twitter @ngVikingsConf for all the real-time updates and read carefully the practical information below.

title: Thank You!
brief: ngVikings 2017 is over. It's been two amazing days and your presence helped make it awesome!
